welcome.title: Welcome to Box Pleating Studio!
intro: This app is made to help origami designers to make complex, crazy designs using box pleating and GOPS gadgets.
To begin, click on the upper-left menu button to create an empty new project, our read our brief user manual on {0}.

install.hint: You can also install BP Studio as a standalone app to your device, and use it offline!
install.ios: How to install on iOS: Open this website in Safari, tap the "Share" icon at the bottom of	your screen, and then tap "Add to home screen".
install.ed: BP Studio is already installed on your device.

preference.includeHidden: Include hidden elements in SVG exports

share.title: Share project
share.message: Check out my project "{0}" designed with Box Pleating Studio!

about.title: About Box Pleating Studio
about.visit: For user manual and feedback, visit the app's {0} on Github.
about.donation: BP Studio is completely free to use. If you find this app helpful to your designing and are interested in supporting this app, you can donate any amount with {0}.

donate.title: Supporting Box Pleating Studio
donate.intro: Thank you for considering supporting Box Pleating Studio! Please enter any amount you would like to donate. You can buy me a coffee with $1, or a dinner with $10, etc. ðŸ˜„ (PayPal handling fee will be added during checkout)
donate.then: Then click the button below and follow the instructions to complete.
donate.wait: Please wait until PayPal complete your transaction...
donate.thank: Thank you very much, {0}, for your kind donation!

message.downloadHint: Right-click and use "Save As" to choose file location.
message.min3vertex: The tree needs to have at least 3 vertices.
message.oldVersion: Project "{0}" was created with an older version of BP Studio, and some stretch patterns may need to be re-selected. It will be updated to the latest format on the next saving.
message.patternNotFound: Some of the overlappings of flaps in this design are valid, but for now BP Studio is unable to find working stretch patterns for them. The author of this app will continue to implement more algorithms to cover more cases.
message.unsaved: Project "{0}" contains unsaved changes. Discard the changes?
